cleaned_text: Full Aromatherapy Crystal Candle Collection - Regular price - $96.25 - Regular price - - Sale price - $96.25 - Unit price - per Our luxury candles combine the numerous benefits of aromatherapy, crystal healing and positive affirmations to provide the most blissful experience possible. Made with 100% natural soy wax and cotton wicks woven with paper. They are 100% vegan, cruelty-free, paraben-free, phthalate-free, gluten-free. Scented with premium fragrance oils and 100% pure, natural, unadulterated essential oils. Hand poured into gorgeous reusable and recyclable glass jars in Montreal, Canada. All of our crystals are real and ethically sourced. INCLUDES: 1 Restore Candle 1 Clear Quartz 1 Love Candle 1 Rose Quartz 1 Success Candle 1 Amazonite 1 Harmony Candle 1 Sodalite Crystal 1 Calm Candle 1 Amethyst Crystal
